metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13982 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Smarty_Security::isTrustedResourceDir() in Smarty before 3.1.33 is prone to a path traversal vulnerability due to insufficient template code sanitization. This allows attackers controlling the executed template code to bypass the trusted directory security restriction and read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: smarty3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
